history.narrative: Law 7-171 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-362, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 28, 1988 and July 12, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 15, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-227 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
